name: Jerry's endless travels Planet Zarg (vz200)
description:
Simple platformer, but some rooms have traps and other tricks. Vz200 version storyline of game is different than Zx spectrum version. Jerry saved Erick, then Gerald. Now he is looking for Chad who has dissapeared.

Controls:

Q-teleport,  O-left,  P-right,  SPACE-jump,  B- shot.
